WASHINGTON - Starting May 11, some people may no longer be allowed to use just a driver's license to take a flight or enter a federal building.
 
 That's the deadline for states to issue new tamperproof and fraud resistant licenses and state identity cards under the Real ID Act of 2005, but not a single state is capable of meeting the requirements. 
 
 http://www.dallasnews.com/sharedcontent/dws/news/texassouthwest/stories/011208dntexrealid.2676762.html
